src:
Robert Puas Bawa Persib Bandung Tundukkan Kalteng Putra
02 Nov 2019, 01:14 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Robert Rene Alberts mengaku puas bisa membawa Persib Bandung meraih tiga poin saat bertandang ke markas Kalteng Putra di laga pekan ke-26 Shopee Liga 1 2019.
Persib bertandang ke markas Kalteng Putra di Stadion Tuah Pahoe, Palangkaraya, Jumat (1/11/2019). Di pertandingan itu Maung Bandung berhasil menang dengan skor 0-2.
Gol pertama Persib lahir melalui Kevin van Kippersluis. Sementara itu gol kedua mereka dicetak oleh legiun asingnya yang lain di lini depan, Ezechiel N'Douassel.
Kalteng Putra sendiri bermain dengan 10 pemain di pertandingan ini. Sebab penyerang mereka yakni Patrich Wanggai, dikartu merah di pertengahan babak pertama setelah kedapatan menendang Achmad Jufriyanto.
text:
Robert Satisfied Bringing Persib Bandung Brought Central Kalimantan Men
02 Nov 2019, 01:14 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Robert Rene Alberts said he was pleased to be able to bring Persib Bandung won three points when they travel to the Kalteng Putra headquarters in the 26th week of Shopee Liga 1 match 2019.
Persib come to the Central Kalimantan Putra headquarters at Tuah Pahoe Stadium, Palangkaraya, Friday (11/01/2019). In that match Maung Bandung won with a score of 0-2.
The first goal Persib was born through Kevin van Kippersluis. Meanwhile their second goal was scored by another foreign legion up front, Ezechiel N'Douassel.
Kalteng Putra himself played with 10 players in this match. Because their attacker, Patrich Wanggai, was sent off in the middle of the first half after being caught kicking Achmad Jufriyanto.
